Sentencas: An anode gas recycle (AGR) system using an ejector for 1 kW solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) was developed to increase the electrical efficiency of combined power generation.
Titulo: Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The effects of recirculation ratio, externally steam feed rate, and fuel utilization were determined experimentally on the AGR-SOFC performance (i.e., output power, stack temperature, and gas composition) using a variable flow ejector and a recirculation ratio of 0.55-0.62, overall fuel utilization of 0.720-84, and steam feed rate of 0-1.5 g/min.
Titulo: Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A quadrupole mass spectrometer was used to identify the recirculation ratio, the gas composition of reformed gas at the AGR-SOFC inlet, and that of the recycle gas at the outlet.
Titulo: Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Compared to one-path SOFC systems, i.e., without an AGR, the AGR-SOFC was stable and generated about 15 W more electricity when the overall fuel utilization was 0.84 and the recirculation ratio was 0.622 with no steam supply.
Titulo: Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This improved performance was due to the reduced H2O concentration in the anodic gas.
Titulo: Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In addition, although the recirculation ratio did not affect the AGR-SOFC performance, a high recirculation ratio can provide steam produced via the electrochemical reaction to the injected fuel for the steam reforming process.
Titulo: Development of Anode Gas Recycle System Using Ejector for 1 kW Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
